short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add features to your favorite anime sites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add features to skip the intro or outro and automatically start the next episode on your favorite anime sites (currently supports gogoanime and burningseries)! Also allows you to create a group to watch anime with your friends.
